briefdescription.para: Default constructor.
Destructor.
Creates an object (menu, dialog, control, ...) from an XML node.

detaileddescription.para: Should check for validity. parent is a higher-level object (usually window, dialog or panel) that is often necessary to create the resource.
If instance is non-NULL it should not create a new instance via 'new' but should rather use this one, and call its Create method.

briefdescription.para: Called from CreateResource after variables were filled.
Returns true if it understands this node and can create a resource from it, false otherwise.

simplesect.para: You must not call any wxXmlResourceHandler methods except IsOfClass() from this method! The instance is not yet initialized with node data at the time CanHandle() is called and it is only safe to operate on node directly or to call IsOfClass().

briefdescription.para: Sets the parent resource.
Add a style flag (e.g.

detaileddescription.para: wxMB_DOCKABLE) to the list of flags understood by this handler.

briefdescription.para: Add styles common to all wxWindow-derived classes.
Creates children.
Helper function.
Creates a resource from a node.
Creates an animation (see wxAnimation) from the filename specified in param.
Gets a bitmap.
Gets a bitmap from an XmlNode.
Gets a bool flag (1, t, yes, on, true are true, everything else is false).
Gets colour in HTML syntax (#RRGGBB).
Returns the current file system.
Gets a dimension (may be in dialog units).
Gets a direction.

detaileddescription.para: If the given param is not present or has empty value, dir is returned by default. Otherwise the value of the parameter is parsed and a warning is generated if it's not one of wxLEFT, wxTOP, wxRIGHT or wxBOTTOM.

briefdescription.para: Gets a font.
Returns the XRCID.
Returns an icon.
Gets an icon from an XmlNode.
Returns an icon bundle.

simplesect.para: Bundles can be loaded either with stock IDs or from files that contain more than one image (e.g. Windows icon files). If a file contains only single image, a bundle with only one icon will be created.

briefdescription.para: Creates an image list from the param markup data.

simplesect.para: The new instance of wxImageList or NULL if no data is found.

briefdescription.para: Gets the integer value from the parameter.
Returns the resource name.
Gets node content from wxXML_ENTITY_NODE.
Finds the node or returns NULL.
Finds the parameter value or returns the empty string.
Returns the node parameter value.
Gets the position (may be in dialog units).
Gets the size (may be in dialog units).
Gets style flags from text in form "flag | flag2| flag3 |..." Only understands flags added with AddStyle().
Gets text from param and does some conversions:

listitem.para: replaces \n, \r, \t by respective characters (according to C syntax)
replaces $ by and $$ by $ (needed for _File to File translation because of XML syntax)

briefdescription.para: Check to see if a parameter exists.
Convenience function.

detaileddescription.para: Returns true if the node has a property class equal to classname, e.g. object class="wxDialog".

briefdescription.para: Sets common window options.
Reports error in XRC resources to the user.
Like ReportError(wxXmlNode*, const wxString&), but uses the node of currently processed object (m_node) as the context.
Like ReportError(wxXmlNode*, const wxString&), but uses the node of parameter param of the currently processed object as the context.

detaileddescription.para: This is convenience function for reporting errors in particular parameters.

briefdescription.para: wxSizerXmlHandler is a class for resource handlers capable of creating a wxSizer object from an XML node.

detaileddescription.para: wxXmlResourceHandler is an abstract base class for resource handlers capable of creating a control from an XML node.
See XML Based Resource System (XRC) for details.
